about_the_game:
GAME DESCRIPTION

Shortly after war ended between the countries of Ratvia and Yallovska, a crime wave erupted. When a human trafficking gang from Ratvia kidnaps a young girl from Yallovska. An ex-military officer named Vladimir who suffers from PTSD has to fight them to bring her back home. You play as Vladimir as you shoot your way through gang members killing as many of them as possible and avoid shooting innocent bystanders along the way.

Play solo in this single game player as you shoot your way through levels, kill members of the human trafficking gang while avoiding killing innocent bystanders at the same time. You have limited amount of ammo so look for clues in each level that will help you find the real criminals who kidnapped the young girl and advance to the next level. In this noir style game.

Game Info

Released : June, 2023

Genre: Third Person Shooter

Publisher : Ahmed Mo'nis

Interface language : English

Voice language: None

Game version : v1.0.0

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS

Recommended minimum system requirements:

- Requires 64-bit processor and operating system

- OS: GNU/LINUX Pop!_OS 22.04 LTS OR Windows 10

- Processor: Intel Core i5 8400 OR AMD Ryzen 5 2600

- RAM: 8 GB RAM

- Video card: 3 GB NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 OR AMD Radeon RX 570

- Disk space (After extraction) : 4.6 GB

The game could still work with different systems than the ones mentioned above. But it may not work perfectly.

Game Controllers
WASD Keyboard buttons for moving
Mouse for changing the angle of looking
Left-Click mouse button for shooting
Space keyboard button for jumping
Ctrl keyboard button for crouching

content_descriptors.notes: The game is about a man who fights a human trafficking gang to save a little girl. The themes of sexual violence and exploitation against children are discussed as a part of the investigation of the protagonist to find the little girl. But nothing sexually explicit is shown in the game.

Minimum:
  • OS: GNU/LINUX Pop!_OS 22.04 LTS
  • Processor: 64-bit processor Intel Core i5 8400 OR AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 3 GB NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 OR AMD Radeon RX 570
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game could still work with different systems than the ones mentioned above. But it may not work perfectly.

short_description: After a young girl is kidnapped by a human trafficking gang, an ex army officer with PTSD has to fight to rescue her. A Third Person shooter with film-noir/neo-noir style
